introduction_text: We dey commit to protect your privacy.
retention_text: We go keep data while account dey active.
third_parties_text: We no dey sell your data.
acceptance_text: By using app, you don agree to these terms.
account_terms_text: Na you dey responsible for your account security.
acceptable_use_text: You agree to use services legally.
termination_text: We fit suspend accounts wey break rules.
refund_intro: We want make you happy with our services. This policy explain how refund go work.
refund_digital_text: Because na digital service, we no dey refund subscription fee after billing period don start.
refund_subscription_text: You fit cancel subscription any time. You go still get access to premium features till current billing period end.
refund_timeframe_text: If you qualify for refund, request go process within 5-10 working days through original payment method.
refund_process_text: To request refund, contact our support team with your account details and why you wan refund.
refund_exceptions_text: We fit consider refund for technical wahala wey stop you from using service or wrong charges.
refund_contact_text: For refund questions, contact our support team with transaction details.
billing_auto_renewal_text: Subscription go renew automatically for each billing period unless you cancel before renewal date.
billing_pricing_text: We fit change prices with notice to existing subscribers. New price go apply for next billing period.
billing_cancellation_text: You fit cancel any time from your account settings. No cancellation fee dey.
payment_terms_text: By using our services, you agree to our payment terms.
payment_processing_text: Payments dey processed securely through our payment partners. We no dey store full card data for our servers.
payment_security_text: We use industry standard encryption and security measures to protect your payment info.
payment_disputes_text: If you see charge wey you no authorize, contact our support team immediately for investigation.
